entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
